external_games.name: Trainz Plus DLC - CFCLA, RailFirst, Freightliner GE C44aci Pack

name: Trainz Plus: CFCLA, RailFirst, Freightliner GE C44aci
summary: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed operated by a number of rail freight operators. This pack features CFCLA, RailFirst, and Freightliner livery units, with custom cab views, full PBR textures, and more.
